The police registered a case on Tuesday after the videos went viral. They have arrested three men suspected to be involved in the assault.The case has been registered under Section 506 (criminal intimidation), 341 (wrongful restraint), 504 (intentional insult) and 323 (voluntarily causing hurt) of the Indian Penal Code as well as under provisions of The Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Act, 1989.
